channel.title: Aural Skills on David John Baker
channel.description: Recent content in Aural Skills on David John Baker

item.title: MCG Reading: McPherson & McDermott 2023
item.description: This week for the Music Cognition Reading Group we read Relative pitch representations and invariance to timbre by Malinda McPherson and Josh McDermott.

item.title: Understanding Melodic Dictation via Experimental Methods
item.description: Last month I received a copy of The Routledge Companion to Aural Skills Pedagogy featuring a chapter titled “Understanding Melodic Dictation via Experimental Methods” by yours truly!
